name: unwaveringly
content:
unwaveringly adverb
(WITHOUT CHANGING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
without changing or becoming weaker: He kept to his version of the story unwaveringly in spite of evidence against him. This is an unwaveringly romantic piece of music.
More examplesFewer examplesThe state authorities were unwaveringly efficient in collecting taxes.My sympathies are unwaveringly with the underdog.She acted with courage and an unwaveringly strong will.
